Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
This class holds all the Accounts in an array. It finds, withdraws, and deposits money into the account. It also opens and closes an Account. Also, prints the accounts by fees and interests, and also sorts them by Account type.
Author:
Minseok Park, Amogh Sarangdhar

  • Method Details

    • getNumAcct

      public int getNumAcct()
      Getter method to return number of Accounts.
      Returns:
      numAcct the number of accounts in the current Database.

    • find

      private int find​(Account account)
      Find the account that is in the Account[] database.
      Parameters:
      account - the Account to be found.
      Returns:
      i, the index of the Account in the Account[] array, else ACCOUNT_NOTFOUND.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      This method grow Account[] by 4 when the array is full.

    • open

      public boolean open​(Account account)
      This method opens a new Account for the holder.
      Parameters:
      account - takes in the Account to be opened.
      Returns:
      true, if account is newly opened; false, if account is reopened.

    • findDoubleCheckingAcc

      private boolean findDoubleCheckingAcc​(Account account)
      This method checks if a holder has both College Checking and Checking account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if a holder has two Checking accounts, false otherwise.

    • close

      public boolean close​(Account account) throws NoSuchObjectException
      This method closes the existing Account of the holder.
      Parameters:
      account - Account that is to be closed
      Returns:
      true, if the Account is closed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NoSuchObjectException

    • deposit

      public void deposit​(Account account) throws ActionToClosedAccount, NoSuchObjectException
      This method deposits money into the Account.
      Parameters:
      account - takes in Account and deposits the depositing value into the Account.
      Throws:
      ActionToClosedAccount
      NoSuchObjectException

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw​(Account account) throws ActionToClosedAccount, NoSuchObjectException
      This method withdraws money from the Account.
      Parameters:
      account - takes in Account and withdraws the withdrawing value from the Account.
      Throws:
      ActionToClosedAccount
      NoSuchObjectException

    • updateBalance

      public void updateBalance()
      This method updates the balance of all the Accounts.

    • print

      public void print​(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
      This method prints out all accounts in current order of the array, Accounts[].

    • printByAccountType

      public void printByAccountType​(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
      Prints all the accounts when they are sorted by Account Type.

    • printFeeAndInterest

      public void printFeeAndInterest​(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
      Prints all the accounts in the database with calculated fees and monthly interest based on current balances.

    • sortByAccountType

      private void sortByAccountType()
      Sort all Accounts by Account types (Bubble Sort). Sorting hierarchy, high to low: C, CC, MM, S. The sorting hierarchy is dealt with account type code.
